function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of cross-sector collaboration","Impact":"Inefficient sharing of best and worst practices related to managing COVID-19 issues","Mitigation":"Establish cross-sector partnerships for knowledge sharing and collaboration","Technologies":"Digital platforms for cross-sector communication and collaboration","People":"Infrastructure sector stakeholders, universities","Owner":"Infrastructure sector stakeholders"},{"Description":"Lack of crisis management skills","Impact":"Inability to effectively respond to once-in-a-generation crises like COVID-19","Mitigation":"Integration of crisis management into education curricula, development of in-house training programs","Technologies":"Online learning platforms, crisis management software","People":"Employees in the infrastructure sector","Owner":"Infrastructure sector stakeholders, universities"},{"Description":"Lack of crisis-response leadership programs","Impact":"Ineffective leadership during crises, leading to poor crisis management","Mitigation":"Development and delivery of bespoke crisis-response leadership programs","Technologies":"Leadership training software, virtual training platforms","People":"Leaders in the infrastructure sector","Owner":"Infrastructure sector stakeholders, leadership training providers"},{"Description":"Resistance to cultural change","Impact":"Inadequate adaptation to challenges such as social distancing, remote-working, and virtual team meetings","Mitigation":"Engagement in dramatic culture change, proactive communication with stakeholders","Technologies":"Remote collaboration tools, communication platforms","People":"Managers and employees in the infrastructure sector","Owner":"Infrastructure sector organizations"}]}
